settings.content: With 3 excellent presets and priority customer support. See the theme [documentation](http://www.shopifythemes.net/collections/shopify-themes/products/icon) or [check out the support docs](http://support.undergroundmedia.co.uk). If you need to reach us please use our [support site](http://support.undergroundmedia.co.uk) or [email us](mailto:create@undergroundmedia.co.uk)

settings.label: Choose Slideshow type
settings.info: Choose a Slideshow style. Content Slideshow features Clickable Images and resizes with the browser, Background is more suited to fill screen images with background images
Upload your Slideshow images and use checkboxes provided to enable or disable each image, image 1 is always shown

settings.content: Add Social Media URLS and Handles
Please ensure for all Social Media Links ( excluding Twitter and instagram ) you must include: http:// at the beginning of the address - all links will open in a new window

settings.label: Your Twitter Handle
settings.info: Example: shopify

settings.label: Your facebook url
settings.info: Example: http://facebook.com/shopify

settings.label: Your Pinterest url
settings.info: Example: http://pinterest.com/shopify

settings.label: Your Tumblr url
settings.info: Example: http://shopify.tumblr.com

settings.label: Your YouTube url
settings.info: Example: http://youtube.com/shopify

settings.label: Your Google+ url
settings.info: Example: http://plus.google.com/shopify

settings.label: Your Instagram ID
settings.info: Example: shopify

settings.content: Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/Do_Tell_Where_The_Money_Is) (â€œDo tell where the money isâ€).
